name: Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet! (Retro Pirate Adventure)
blurb: Join Nelly Cootalot in this retro Adventure Game, and rescue birds hypnotised by the villainous Baron Widebeard.

rewards.reward: Landlubber (Approx. $1.50): Buy a lady a drink and receive a nice drawing of Nelly and a polite thank-you via email.
Stowaway (Approx. $6): Sneak in early and grab a DRM-Free Digital Download of Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet for a small number of gold pieces.
Cabin Boy (Approx. $12): Ahoy! A DRM-Free Digital Download of the game, a DRM-Free Soundtrack and YOUR name will appear in the Rogue's Gallery in-game!

Sea Dog (Approx. $15): Avast! As a Sea Dog you get all of the Cabin Boy's loot, plus a hi-res Digital Poster, 4 shiny Desktop Wallpapers and access to the insight and wisdom of Captain Nelly's Development Log.
Swashbuckler (Approx. $23): The lucky Swashbuckler will get his coarse, salty hands on an actual, real-world, physical DVD of Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet. Plus all previous rewards.

Cyber Monkey (Approx. \u00a327.50): A new Digital tier by popular demand. No shipping involved! The Cyber Monkey gets a DRM free download of the game, as well as a Digital Treasure Map. They can also stay involved in development with access to the Beta Release (Windows) and Forums. Plus all previous digital tiers!

Buccaneer (Approx. $30.50): A treasure trove awaits the Buccaneer - a 'genuine' Treasure Map (treasure not included), a 'fashionable' 25mm Spoonbeak Pin-Badge, and a signed postcard from Nelly Cootalot. Plus all previous rewards.

Virtual Pirate (Approx. $45.50): This tier offers *Purely Digital* rewards for people who hate reality and/or the postal service. Delight strangers on public transport with your Nelly Cootalot ringtone! Be the first to play the game with access to the Beta Testing Release (Windows) and membership of the Beta Forum. See a Pirate Portrait of YOU appear in the Rogue's Gallery in-game. You'll also receive PDF versions of Nelly's Postcard and Treasure Map. Plus all previous digital rewards.

Pirate Captain (Approx. $61): A Pirate Doubloon made of 100% GENUINE metal awaits the Pirate Captain! Marvel at a Pirate Portrait of YOU in the in-game Rogue's Gallery. You'll also receive a pack of never-before-seen Nelly Cootalot stickers to decorate the wall by your hammock. Plus all previous rewards (except Virtual Pirate).

Corsair (Approx. $76): Adorn your cabin with a glossy 29.7cm x 42cm (11.7\u201d x 16.5\u201d) poster of Nelly Cootalot and the Fowl Fleet. You'll also be the envy of your rivals with a Nelly Cootalot Pin-Badge. Plus all previous rewards (ex. VP).

Digital Rogue (Approx. $76): Stacking upon the Virtual Pirate tier (like pirates on a dead man's chest) this is a premium *Purely Digital* reward. Download Digital versions of ALL of the print rewards, including a Game Art and Design Book, packed with concept art and design notes. You'll also find a Gold-Framed Pirate Portrait of YOU in the in-game Rogue's Gallery and a delicious Producer Credit waiting for you. Plus all previous digital rewards!

Prince of Pirates (Approx. $99): Sail home with an exclusive limited-edition Dreadnought Coaster featured in an in-game puzzle. Lord it over your enemies! Place it under your cups! You'll also have YOUR name immortalised in an in-game song, by folk-hero Solomon Spry and see a Gold-Framed Pirate Portrait of YOU in the in-game Rogue's Gallery. Includes all previous rewards (except Digital Swashbuckler).

Commodore (Approx. $114.50): Receive an Insta-Coot pack comprising 4 pieces of Character Art in the form of photo-quality Polaroid-style prints: Nelly Cootalot, The Villains of the Piece, The Fowl Fleet and Bloodbeard with his long-lost sweetheart.  Plus all previous rewards (exc. DS and Limited Edition).

Pirate King (Approx. $153): As Pirate Portraits go, this is El Supremo: Alasdair will draw a unique 10x15cm (4\u201dx6\u201d) Pirate Portrait of YOU, and frame it so that all who witness your mantelpiece will bow before your glory! Pirate Kings will also receive a Producer Credit. Plus all previous rewards (exc. DS and LE).

Admiral o'the Fleet (Approx. $229): As the only clothing befitting an Admiral, you will receive a Nelly Cootalot T-shirt to wear around your torso and, to a lesser extent, arms. Shame others with your superior fashion-sense! You'll also receive a unique piece of hand-drawn Original Game Art. You'll receive a Producer Credit, ALL the digital rewards, plus all previous rewards (exc. LE).

Digital Drunkard (Approx. $275): A fabulous all-digital tier offering the chance to appear in-game as a drunk pirate! A character inspired by YOU will be discovered in a state ranging from snooze to comatose. What heroism! Also includes all previous digital rewards!

Davy Jones (Approx. $381): At this very special tier, you'll have a starring role as an in-game character. Alasdair will craft a character inspired by you, and you'll even have the chance to record a line or two of dialogue. Now's your chance to quaff rum with the denizens of the Walking Dead Bar or visit the windswept isle of Gloomholm. You'll receive your Original Game Art in a frame and have access to the Beta Release (Windows) and the Beta Forums. Plus all previous rewards (exc. LE).

Neptune (Approx. $762): The top tier offers a hardback Game Art and Design Book, packed with concept art and design notes from the game's development. You'll also receive a felt Coot (hand-made by the real-life Nelly), for you to love and/or cherish. You'll also find a juicy Executive Producer Credit waiting for you in the game credits. Plus all previous tiers (exc. LE). That's a lot of stuff!
